00368     class Ctx {
00369     public:
00370         Ctx();
00371         ~Ctx();
00373         I32 arg_len() {
00374             return (I32)(PL_stack_sp - mark);
00375         }
00377         Scalar* arg(int n) {
00378             Scalar*s = new Scalar(fetch_stack(n));
00379             this->register_allocated(s);
00380             return s;
00381         }
00383         void ret(Scalar s) {
00384             this->ret(0, &s);
00385         }
00386         void ret(Scalar* s) {
00387             this->ret(0, s);
00388         }
00389         void ret(int n, Scalar* s) {
00390             this->ret(n, s ? s->serialize() : &PL_sv_undef);
00391         }
00393         bool wantarray() {
00394             return GIMME_V & G_ARRAY ? true : false;
00395         }
00397         void ret(Array* ary) {
00398             unsigned int size = ary->size();
00399             if (size != 0) {
00400                 SV** sp = PL_stack_sp;
00401                 if ((unsigned int)(PL_stack_max - sp) < size) {
00402                     sp = stack_grow(sp, sp, size);
00403                 }
00404 
00405                 for (unsigned int i=0; i < size; ++i) {
00406                     Scalar * s = ary->fetch(i);
00407                     PL_stack_base[ax++] = s->val;
00408                 }
00409                 ax--;
00410             } else {
00411                 this->return_undef();
00412             }
00413         }
00415         void return_true() {
00416             this->ret(0, &PL_sv_yes);
00417         }
00419         void return_undef() {
00420             this->ret(0, &PL_sv_undef);
00421         }
00427         void register_allocated(Value* v) {
00428             allocated.push_back(v);
00429         }
00430     protected:
00435         SV* fetch_stack(int n) {
00436             return PL_stack_base[this->ax + n];
00437         }
00438         void ret(int n, SV* s) {
00439             PL_stack_base[ax + n] = s;
00440         }
00441         I32 ax;
00442         SV ** mark;
00443         std::vector<Value*> allocated;
00444     };
00445     std::vector<Ctx*> ctxstack;
00446     Ctx::Ctx() {
00447         // same as dAXMARK
00448         this->ax = *PL_markstack_ptr + 1;
00449         --PL_markstack_ptr;
00450         this->mark = PL_stack_base + ax - 1;
00451 
00452         ctxstack.push_back(this);
00453     }
00454     Ctx::~Ctx() {
00455         std::vector<Value*>::iterator iter;
00456         for (iter = allocated.begin(); iter != allocated.end(); iter++) {
00457             delete *iter;
00458         }
00459 
00460         PL_stack_sp = PL_stack_base + ax;
00461 
00462         ctxstack.pop_back();
00463     }

00481     Reference * Hash::fetch(const char* key) {
00482         // SV**    hv_fetch(HV* tb, const char* key, I32 klen, I32 lval)
00483         SV ** v = hv_fetch((HV*)this->val, key, strlen(key), 0);
00484         if (v) {
00485             Reference * ref = new Reference(*v);
00486             CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(ref);
00487             return ref;
00488         } else {
00489             return NULL;
00490         }
00491     }
00492     Reference * Array::fetch(I32 key) {
00493         SV ** v = av_fetch((AV*)this->val, key, 0);
00494         if (v) {
00495             Reference * ref = new Reference(*v);
00496             CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(ref);
00497             return ref;
00498         } else {
00499             return NULL;
00500         }
00501     }
00502     Scalar * Array::pop() {
00503         SV* v = av_pop((AV*)this->val);
00504         Scalar *s = new Scalar(v);
00505         CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(s);
00506         return s;
00507     }
00508     Scalar * Array::shift() {
00509         SV* v = av_shift((AV*)this->val);
00510         Scalar *s = new Scalar(v);
00511         CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(s);
00512         return s;
00513     }
00514     Scalar * Array::store(I32 key, Scalar* _v) {
00515         _v->refcnt_inc();
00516         SV** v = av_store((AV*)this->val, key, _v->val);
00517         if (v) {
00518             Reference * ref = new Reference(*v);
00519             CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(ref);
00520             return ref;
00521         } else {
00522             return NULL;
00523         }
00524     }

00540             newXS((pkg + "::" + name).c_str(), func, file);
00541         }
00546         void add_constant(const char *name, Value * val) {
00547             this->add_constant(name, val->val);
00548         }
00549         void add_constant(const char *name, Value val) {
00550             this->add_constant(name, val.val);
00551         }
00552     protected:
00553         void add_constant(const char *name, SV* val) {
00554             newCONSTSUB(stash, name, val);
00555         }
00556     private:

00564     class BootstrapCtx : public Ctx {
00565     public:
00566         BootstrapCtx() : Ctx() {
00567             xs_version_bootcheck();
00568         }
00569         ~BootstrapCtx() {
00570             PL_stack_base[this->ax] = &PL_sv_yes;
00571             PL_stack_sp = PL_stack_base + this->ax;
00572         }
00573     protected:
00574         // XS_VERSION_BOOTCHECK
00575         void xs_version_bootcheck() {
00576             SV *_sv;
00577             const char *vn = NULL, *module = SvPV_nolen_const(ST(0));
00578             if (this->arg_len() >= 2) {
00579                 /* version supplied as bootstrap arg */
00580                 _sv = PL_stack_base[ax+1];
00581             } else {
00582                 /* XXX GV_ADDWARN */
00583                 _sv = get_sv(Perl_form(aTHX_ "%s::%s", module,
00584                         vn = "XS_VERSION"), FALSE);
00585                 if (!_sv || !SvOK(_sv))
00586                 _sv = get_sv(Perl_form(aTHX_ "%s::%s", module,
00587                             vn = "VERSION"), FALSE);
00588             }
00589             if (_sv) {
00590                 SV *xssv = Perl_newSVpv(aTHX_ XS_VERSION, 0);
00591                 xssv = new_version(xssv);
00592                 if ( !sv_derived_from(_sv, "version") ) {
00593                     _sv = new_version(_sv);
00594                 }
00595                 if ( vcmp(_sv,xssv) ) {
00596                     Perl_croak(aTHX_ "%s object version %"SVf" does not match %s%s%s%s %"SVf,
00597                         module, SVfARG(vstringify(xssv)),
00598                         vn ? "$" : "", vn ? module : "", vn ? "::" : "",
00599                         vn ? vn : "bootstrap parameter", SVfARG(vstringify(_sv)));
00600                 }
00601             }
00602         }
00603     };
00604 
00608     class Code : public Scalar {
00609     public:
00610         Code(SV * _s) : Scalar(_s) { }
00612         void call(Array * args, Array* retval) {
00613             SV **sp = PL_stack_sp;
00614 
00615             push_scope(); // ENTER
00616             save_int((int*)&PL_tmps_floor); // SAVETMPS
00617             PL_tmps_floor = PL_tmps_ix;
00618 
00619             if (++PL_markstack_ptr == PL_markstack_max) { // PUSHMARK(SP);
00620                 markstack_grow();
00621             }
00622             *PL_markstack_ptr = (I32)((sp) - PL_stack_base);
00623 
00624             for (int i =0; i < args->len()+1; i++) {
00625                 if (PL_stack_max - sp < 1) { // EXTEND()
00626                     // optimize?
00627                     sp = stack_grow(sp, sp, 1);
00628                 }
00629                 *++sp = args->pop()->val; // XPUSHs
00630             }
00631             PL_stack_sp = sp; // PUTBACK
00632 
00633             int count = call_sv(this->val, G_ARRAY);
00634 
00635             sp = PL_stack_sp; // SPAGAIN
00636 
00637             for (int i=0; i<count; i++) {
00638                 Scalar * s = new Scalar(newSVsv(*sp--));
00639                 CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(s);
00640                 retval->store(i, s);
00641             }
00642 
00643             PL_stack_sp = sp; // PUTBACK
00644             if (PL_tmps_ix > PL_tmps_floor) { // FREETMPS
00645                 free_tmps();
00646             }
00647             pop_scope(); // LEAVE
00648         }
00650         void call(Array * args, Scalar** retval) {
00651             SV **sp = PL_stack_sp;
00652 
00653             push_scope(); // ENTER
00654             save_int((int*)&PL_tmps_floor); // SAVETMPS
00655             PL_tmps_floor = PL_tmps_ix;
00656 
00657             if (++PL_markstack_ptr == PL_markstack_max) { // PUSHMARK(SP);
00658                 markstack_grow();
00659             }
00660             *PL_markstack_ptr = (I32)((sp) - PL_stack_base);
00661 
00662             for (int i =0; i < args->len()+1; i++) {
00663                 if (PL_stack_max - sp < 1) { // EXTEND()
00664                     // optimize?
00665                     sp = stack_grow(sp, sp, 1);
00666                 }
00667                 *++sp = args->pop()->val; // XPUSHs
00668             }
00669             PL_stack_sp = sp; // PUTBACK
00670 
00671             int count = call_sv(this->val, G_SCALAR);
00672 
00673             sp = PL_stack_sp; // SPAGAIN
00674 
00675             if (count != 0) {
00676                 *retval = new Scalar(newSVsv(*sp--));
00677                 CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(*retval);
00678             }
00679 
00680             PL_stack_sp = sp; // PUTBACK
00681             if (PL_tmps_ix > PL_tmps_floor) { // FREETMPS
00682                 free_tmps();
00683             }
00684             pop_scope(); // LEAVE
00685         }
00686     };

00691     class Pointer : public Scalar {
00692     public:
00693         Pointer(SV* s) : Scalar(s) { }
00695         Pointer(void* _ptr, const char* klass) : Scalar(sv_newmortal()) {
00696             if (_ptr == NULL) {
00697                 sv_setsv(this->val, &PL_sv_undef);
00698             } else {
00699                 sv_setref_pv(this->val, klass, _ptr);
00700             }
00701         }
00702 
00706         template <class T>
00707         T extract() {
00708             return INT2PTR(T, SvROK(this->val) ? SvIV(SvRV(this->val)) : SvIV(this->val));
00709         }
00710     };

00715     class Carp {
00716     public:
00717         static void croak(const char * format, ...) {
00718             va_list args;
00719             va_start(args, format);
00720             Perl_vcroak(aTHX_ format, &args);
00721             va_end(args);
00722         }
00723         static void warn(const char * format, ...) {
00724             va_list args;
00725             va_start(args, format);
00726             Perl_vwarn(aTHX_ format, &args);
00727             va_end(args);
00728         }
00729     };

00735     class FileTest {
00736     public:
00741         static bool is_regular_file(const char * fname) {
00742             Stat_t buf;
00743             int ret = PerlLIO_stat(fname, &buf);
00744             if (ret == 0 && S_ISREG(buf.st_mode)) {
00745                 return true;
00746             } else {
00747                 return false;
00748             }
00749         }
00754         static bool is_dir(const char * fname) {
00755             Stat_t buf;
00756             int ret = PerlLIO_stat(fname, &buf);
00757             if (ret == 0 && S_ISDIR(buf.st_mode)) {
00758                 return true;
00759             } else {
00760                 return false;
00761             }
00762         }
00763     };

00769     Str* Scalar::as_str() {
00770         if (SvPOK(this->val)) {
00771             Str * s = new Str(this->val);
00772             CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(s);
00773             return s;
00774         } else {
00775             Perl_croak(aTHX_ "%s: %s is not a string",
00776                 "Devel::BindPP",
00777                 "sv");
00778         }
00779     }
00780     Pointer* Scalar::as_pointer() {
00781         if (SvROK(this->val)) {
00782             Pointer * s = new Pointer(this->val);

00784             return s;
00785         } else {
00786             Perl_croak(aTHX_ "%s: %s is not a pointer",
00787                 "Devel::BindPP",
00788                 "sv");
00789         }
00790     }

00844     Hash * Reference::as_hash() {
00845         if (SvROK(this->val) && SvTYPE(SvRV(this->val))==SVt_PVHV) {
00846             HV* h = (HV*)SvRV(this->val);
00847             Hash * hobj = new Hash(h);
00848             CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(hobj);
00849             return hobj;
00850         } else {
00851             Perl_croak(aTHX_ "%s: %s is not a hash reference",
00852                 "Devel::BindPP",
00853                 "hv");
00854         }
00855     }
00856     Array * Reference::as_array() {
00857         SV* v = this->val;
00858         if (SvROK(v) && SvTYPE(SvRV(v))==SVt_PVAV) {
00859             AV* a = (AV*)SvRV(v);
00860             Array * obj = new Array(a);
00861             CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(obj);
00862             return obj;
00863         } else {
00864             Perl_croak(aTHX_ "%s: %s is not a array reference",
00865                 "Devel::BindPP",
00866                 "av");
00867         }
00868     }
00869     Scalar * Reference::as_scalar() {
00870         SV* v = this->val;
00871         if (v && SvROK(v)) {
00872             SV* a = (SV*)SvRV(v);
00873             Scalar * obj = new Scalar(a);
00874             CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(obj);
00875             return obj;
00876         } else {
00877             Perl_croak(aTHX_ "%s: %s is not a array reference",
00878                 "Devel::BindPP",
00879                 "sv");
00880         }
00881     }
00882     Code * Reference::as_code() {
00883         SV* v = this->val;
00884         if (v && SvROK(v)) {
00885             SV* a = (SV*)SvRV(v);
00886             Code * obj = new Code(a);
00887             CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(obj);
00888             return obj;
00889         } else {
00890             Perl_croak(aTHX_ "%s: %s is not a array reference",
00891                 "Devel::BindPP",
00892                 "sv");
00893         }
00894     }
00895 
00896     Reference* Hash::del(const char*key, I32 klen) {
00897         Reference * ref = new Reference(hv_delete((HV*)this->val, key, klen, 0));
00898         CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(ref);
00899         return ref;
00900     }
00901     Reference* Hash::store(const char*key, I32 klen, Scalar*value) {
00902         value->refcnt_inc();
00903         SV ** s = hv_store((HV*)this->val, key, klen, value->val, 0);
00904         assert(s && SvROK(*s));
00905         Reference * ref = new Reference(*s);
00906         CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(ref);
00907         return ref;
00908     }
00909     Scalar* Hash::scalar() {
00910         Scalar*s = new Scalar(hv_scalar((HV*)this->val));
00911         CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(s);
00912         return s;
00913     }
00914     void Hash::undef() {
00915         hv_undef((HV*)this->val);
00916     }
00917     void Hash::clear() {
00918         hv_clear((HV*)this->val);
00919     }
00920     Boolean* Boolean::yes() {
00921         Boolean* s = new Boolean(true);
00922         CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(s);
00923         return s;
00924     }
00925     Boolean* Boolean::no() {
00926         Boolean* s = new Boolean(false);
00927         CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(s);
00928         return s;
00929     }
